summary: A small chest to be found atop the Western Watchtower. The chest is designed to hold Dalynaian Books. That is, books about the history and people of Dalynaia.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Azabiels Chest
Version: 1.0
Date: 2/15/2012
Category: Misc.
Author(s): Vathelis (A.K.A. Azabiel)
Source: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9740

Description
===========
This is Azabiel\'s Chest of Dalynaian Lore. It is designed to hold books about the history and people of Dalynaia. Dalynaia is a world of my own creation, and is in no way related to the lore of The Elder Scrolls.



Location
========
This adds a small chest on the very top level of the Western Watchtower near Whiterun.



Details
=======

I intend to include more books to fill out the majority of the history of Dalynaia in this chest. I will update with more books as I complete them, so be warned that the chest will be getting updates, and could potentially result in lost items if stored in the chest.



Install
=======
1. Extract the files to a temporary location.
2. Examine the folder structure and make corrections where necessary.
3. Copy files to (install folder)\\Skyrim\\Data\\
4. Start Skyrim Launcher, click \'Data Files\', place a checkmark beside the .esp file(s).



Uninstall
=========
1. Start Skyrim Launcher, click Data Files, uncheck the .esp file(s).
2. Delete the files/folders associated with the mod.



History
=======

1.0, 02/15/2012 - Initial release.



Contact
=======

You can find me on SkyrimNexus as \'Vathelis\'
You can send me an email here: azabiel@live.com
You can add me on MSN here: azabiel@live.com
You can find more about Dalynaia Here: azabiel.deviantart.com



Credits
=======

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to Skyrimnexus.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.



Licensing/Legal
===============

You must contact me and obtain my permission before re-packaging any part of
this mod. If I do not respond within 1 month, feel free to do whatever you
like with this mod.
author: Vathelis
